content: I'm so glad I could help! It was a pleasure chatting with you and providing guidance on your journey to prioritize your mental health and process your emotions. Remember, taking care of your mental well-being is a brave and important step, and I'm proud of you for taking the first step. If you have any more questions or need further guidance, don't hesitate to reach out. Wishing you all the best on your journey towards healing and growth!
